name: Meadow Chase
description:
Meadow Chase is a game where you can’t touch the helicopter because your head will fall off.

You can touch the pizza to get you points but if you touch the pizza an enemy (helicopter) around the screen.

 If you touch a heart, it’s a life and at the start you have three.

  If you touch the bomb all you enemies go off the board.

Meadow chase is a game to play with friends or on your own. Just remember to have fun and try beat your personal best every time, if you keep track of your highest score.
